duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and negotiate procurement of IT equipment and services, demonstrating strong negotiation skills and vendor relationship management.
Oversee category management and strategic sourcing for IT and Professional Services, ensuring cost-effective and efficient procurement processes.
Utilize procurement systems and procedures to streamline purchasing activities and optimize supply chain operations.
Demonstrate expertise in managing IT procurement categories such as Cloud, Hosting, SaaS Agreements, Digital, Hardware, and Software License Agreements.
Lead a team of procurement specialists, providing guidance and fostering collaboration to achieve procurement objectives.
Analyze market trends and pricing to identify opportunities for cost savings and improved procurement strategies.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with procurement goals and budget targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Procurement, Supply Chain, or related field (Master’s preferred)
